text: HER ONGYNð BE CRISTENDOME.
Leofan men, eallum cristenum mannum is mycel þearf þæt hy heora cristendomes gescad witan, & þæt hy heora cristendom rihtlice healdan.
Be Cristes agenum naman syn cristene genamode, forðam Crist is cristenra heafod, & ealle cristene men syndon to Cristes limum getealde, gyf hy heora cristendom gehealdað mid rihte.

Lytel fremað þeah cristen nama butan cristenum dædum, ac se bið rihtlice cristen þe Cristes larum & his lagum folgað ealswa se apostol cwæð:Qui se dicit in Cristum credere debet ambulare sicut et ipse ambulauit.
Se þe secge þæt he on Crist gelyfe, fare se þæs rihtweges þe Crist sylf ferde.

And ðeah hwa cweðe þæt he on Crist rihtlice gelyfe & nele his larum ne his lagum folgian, he lihð him sylfum; & Crist sylf eac on his godspelle swytollice þus spæc:Si diligitis me, mandata mea seruate.
Gyf ge me lufian, he cwæð, folgiað minum larum, forðam se me ne lufiað na þe nele minum larum rihtlice fyligean.
Nu age we þearfe þe cristene syndon þæt we georne his larum & his lagum fyligean.

Leofan men, hit gewearð on geardagum þæt God sylf spæc hludre stefne of Synai Munte to Moyse þam heretogan & to Israhela folce & ðus cwæþ be him sylfum & be his agenum lagum:Ego sum Dominus Deus tuus, et reliqua.
Ic eom ðin Drihten, he cwæð, þe gelædde þe ut of Egyptum.
Ne weorða þu fremde godas.
Ne þu þines Drihtnes naman ne namie on idel.
Wite þæt ðu þæne restedæg freolsige georne.
Weorða geornlice fæder & modor.
Ne beo ðu ænig manslaga.
Ne afyl þe mid forligere.
Ne sceaþa ðu.
Ne leoh þu.
Ne gyrn ðu oðres mannes wifes, ne æniges þinges þe oðer man age ne gyrn þu on unriht.
Ðas tyn beboda God sylf gedihte & awrat & Moyse befæste; & Crist on his godspelle eft hy geswutelode, & he georne eac lærde þæt manna gehwilc oðrum beode þæt þæt he wille þæt man him beode.
Ðæt is rihtlic lagu, & se bið gesælig se þe hy gehealdeð.

Þas beboda & fela hertoeacan we sculon healdan, be þam þe us Cristesbec gelomlice lærað, gif we Gode willaþ rihtlice hyran, swa swa us þearf is, & eal þæt gelæstan þæt þæt we behetan þa we fulluht underfengan oððon þa þe æt fontbæþe ure forespecan wæran.
Eala, leofan men, us is swyðe mycel þearf þæt we ofer ealle oðre þing God huru lufian & his larum & lagum geornlice fyligean & his halgan cyrican syngallice weorðian.

Ealle we habbað ænne heofonlicne fæder & ane gastlice modor, seo isecclesiagenamod, þæt is Godes cyrice, & ða we sculan æfre lufian & weorðian & næfre hyre derian wordes ne weorces, ac griðian hy symle & healdan unwemme & a butan glemme.
La hwæt, fremað cyrichatan cristendom on unnyt, forðam ælc þæra bið Godes feond þe bið Godes cyrcena feond, & ðe Godes cyrcena riht wanað oððe wyrdeð.
And egeslice spæc Gregorius be ðam þa ða he þus cwæð:si quis ecclesiam Dei denudauerit uel sanctimonia uiolauerit, anathema sit; ad quod respondentes omnes dixerunt, amen.

Se ðe Godes cyrican, he cwæð, rype oððe reafige oððe halignessa grið scyrde oððe wyrde, a he forwyrðe; & Romana witan him andwyrdan sona & anmodlice cwædon,amen, ealle; þæt bið on Englisc, swa hit geweorðe.
Eala, rihte gedafenað cristenum mannum þæt hi Crist sylfne geefenlæcan georne, þæs ðe hy don magon, & Cristes cyrican weorðian & werian & swa don eac georne swa se halga gast lærð þæt we don sculon.
Ðæt is, þæt gehwa georne unriht forlæte & inwerdre heortan hwyrfe to rihte for Gode & for worulde.

La, hu mæg man eaðost gehwyrfan fram yfele & fram unrihte, butan þæt man deofol georne forbuge & his undæda ealle oferhogie & wið his unlara geornlice scylde & wið þa deoflican eahta leahtras dæges & nihtes warnie symle?
Ðæt is gitsung & gifernes, galnes & weamodnys, unrotnys & asolcennys, gylpgeornys & ofermodignys.
Of ðyson eahta deofles cræftan ealle unþeawas up aspringað & syðþan tobrædað ealles to wide.
Ðonne syndon eahta healice mægnu þurh Godes mihte mannum gescyfte: ðæt is rumheortnys & syfernys, clænnes & modþwærnes, glædnes & anrædnys, sybgeornes & eadmodnes.
Mid þysan mægenan we us sculon werian & ðurh Godes fultum deofol oferwinnan & his unþeawan fæste wiðstandan.
Leofan men, ure Drihten spæc to Moyse hwilum & be ðære gitsunge þus cwæð:Non concupiscas ullam rem proximi tui.
Ne gyrn ðu on unriht, he cwæð, æniges þinges þe oðer man age, & se apostol cwæð:radix omnium malorum est cupiditas.
Gitsung is wyrtruma, he cwæð, æghwylces yfeles.
Leofan men, doð swa ic lære, scyldað wið þa gitsunge æfre swyðe georne & warniað eac symle wið gyfernesse georne.
Ðurh gifernesse Adam forlet ærest paradisum.
And eac ic lære georne manna gehwylcne þæt ænig ne afyle mid fulan forligere æfre hine sylfne.
Ne ænig ne healde yrre on his heortan ealles to lange.
Ne ænig ðurh worldhoge forsorgie to swyðe, ac hihte on his Drihten.
Ne æfre ænig man idelnesse lufige ealles to gelome.
Ne æfre ænig man unnyt lof & idel gylp lufige to swyðe.
Ne æfre ænig man ofermetta lufie, ac æfre hy ascunie.
And scylde man eac wið mansliht æfre swyðe georne, & scylde man wið galnysse & wið æwbryce georne; & wið ælc woh gestreon beorge man georne, ac stryne mid rihte.
Unrihte gemeta & woge gewihta aweorpe man georne, & æfre ænig man oðrum ne swicie ealles to swyðe.
Ne ænig man oðerne to nearwe ne hæfte ne on unriht ne geþeowige.
Ne ænig man þurh reaflac oðerne ne rype.
Ne ænig man oðerne on unriht ne fordeme.
Ne ænig man oðerne ne tyrie ne ne tyne ealles to swyðe.
Ne ænig man hine sylfne mid mane ne forswerie.
Ne on leasre gewitnesse ænig man ne stande.
Ne ænig man ne gewunie þæt he huxlice onhisce, ne ðurh hyrwnesse God ne gegremie.
Ne ænig man to hlagol sy ne færinga to fægen ne eft ne beo to ormod.
Ne ænig man oþerne bæftan ne tæle ne hyrwe to swyðe.
Ne ænig man andan ne healde on his heortan ealles to fæste.
Ne ænig man oðerne ne hatie to swyðe.
Ne ænig man ne gewunie þæt he mid yfelum wordum to wyriende weorðe.
Ne ænig man ne sy to sacfull ne ealles to geflitgeorn.
Ne ænig man ne lufige druncen to swyðe ne fule oferfylle.
Ne ænig man myrtenes æfre ne abite ne blodes ne abyrige.
Ne ænig man wiccecræft æfre begange.
Ne ænig man idola weorðie æfre.
Ne ænig man gemanan wið amansode hæbbe.
Sunnandæges weorðunge nænig man forgyme.
Ælc man his teoðunga gelæste mid rihte.
Freolsa & fæstena healde man georne.
Ðæt man Gode behate ne aleoge man æfre.
Ne ænig man mid unandettan heafodleahtrum husles ne abyrige, ac andette & bete ær he husel ðicge.
Eac ic lære georne manna gehwilcne þæt he his synna andette gelome & mid dædbote clænsie hine sylfne & bletsunge æt biscope & mildsunge gyrne.
Forðam, understande se ðe wille, eal hit mæg to ðearfe, ealswa þæt godspel cwæð:Penitentiam agite; adpropinquabit uobis regnum celorum.
Doð dædbote eowra synna & eow sona wyrð heofona rices duru raðe untyned.
Leofan man, on eornost ic lære, cyrrað from yfele & fram unrihte & doð to gode a swa leng swa mare.
Gymað georne Godes lage & healdað hy fæste & gelome on gearfæce gearwiað eow to husle.
Eala, leofan men, ne latiað na, ne latiað, ac ofstlice efstað & to Gode wendað.
And se ðe wære gitsiende oðra manna þinga & æhta, weorðe of his agenan rihte begytenan ælmesgyfa georne.
Se þe wære gifre, weorðe se syfre; & se ðe wære galsere on fulan forligere, weorðe se clænsere his agenre sawle.
Se þe wære weamod, weorðe se geþyldmod.
Se ðe wære hohmod, weorðe se glædmod.
Se ðe wære idelgeorn, weorðe se notgeorn.
Se ðe wære lofgeorn for idelan weorðscype, weorðe se carfull hu he swyþast mæge gecweman his Drihtne.
Se ðe wære ofermod, weorðe se eadmod.
Se ðe wære scaðiende, weorðe se tiligende on rihtlicre tilðe.
Se ðe wære slapol, weorðe se ful wacor, & se ðe wære full slaw, weorðe se unslaw to cyrican gelome for agenre þearfe.
Se ðe wære leassagol, weorðe se soðsagol.
Se ðe wære bæcslitol, weorðe se wærsagol.
Se ðe wære stuntwyrde, weorðe se wiswyrde.
And se ðe on unriht abysgode hine sylfne, se on halgum gebedum abysgie hine symle.
And se ðe wære ungeleafful rihtes geleafan, weorðe se geleafful godcundes rihtes.
Ðus man sceal ælc unriht mid rihte gebetan & unweod aweodian & god sæd aræran.
Nu la, leofan men, gelyfað huru georne & anrædlice beþencað þæt annes & ðrynnes on godcundnesse an is; ðæt is fæder & sunu & frofergast.
Ealle þa ðry naman befehð an godcund miht & is untodæled an ece God, wealdend & wyrhta ealra gesceafta.
Se is to lufianne & to weorðianne ofer ealle oðre ðing.
And riht is þæt ælc cristen man eac oðerne lufie & healde mid rihte, & þæt ænig oðrum ne beode butan þæt he wylle þæt man him beode.
Ne ænig ne syrwe ne oðrum ne swicie, ac healde ælc oðerne mid rihtre getrywðe.
Ic lære eac georne manna gehwylcne þæt he Godes ege hæbbe æfre on gemynde & Godes hus symle weorðie & werie & sece gelome him sylfum to þearfe.
Sibbe & some lufie man georne & ælc fracodlic facn æfre aweorpe & æghwylcne hæðenscype wordes & weorces forhogie man æfre.
Godcundre lare folgie man georne & inweardre heortan clypie man to Criste oft & gelome, & cyrican gegrete mid leohte & lacum swa man oftost mæge.
Rihte teoðunga gelæste man glædlice, & Godes sacerdan hlyste man georne & hy for Godes ege lufige & weorðie,ut Dominus dicit: Qui uos audit, et reliqua.
Ælmesgedal dæle man gelome, Mete þam ofhingredum, drenc þam ofðyrstum, hushleow gefarenum, wæfels þam nacedum, frofer þam dreorigan, neosunge þam seocan, & byrgenne þam deadan.
Wydewan & steopcild werie man & nerie, & ðearfena gehwylcum helpe man georne.
Domas & dihtas rihte man geornlice, þæt leod & lagu trumlice stande.
Beo manna gehwylc hold & getrywe his worldhlaforde æfre mid rihte, & beo hlaforda gehwylc milde his mannum & hy næfre ne swence on unriht to swyðe.
Beo manna gehwylc milde on mode & miltsie for Godes ege, þær he derian mæge.
Godfæder his godbearn lufie & lære & unrihtes styre.
Pater noster & credan mymerian þa yldran & tæcan heora gingran mid rihtan geleafan.
On manna gehwylces mode & muðe soðsagu stande.
On heortan & on weorcan clænnes gelufie; on geðance & on þeawan syfernes gelicie.
Eac ic lære georne manna gehwylcne þæt he his luste to swyðe ne fulgange, ac mid forhæfednesse oft & gelome wylde hine sylfne him sylfum to ðearfe.
And doð swa ic lære, hyran þa gingran georne heora yldran, & lufian & læran þa yldran heora gingran; & ða þe lifes weg lædan cunnan gebringan on rihtwege þa ðe ær dweledan.
And styre man þam stuntum, & hlyste man þam wisan, & afæstnie man symle georne on heortan godcunde þearfe, & ealne modes hiht on God sylfne besette man fæste.
Ondræde man domdæg & for helle agrise, & ecre reste earnie man georne, & æghwylce dæge a manna gehwylc forhtige for synnum & æfre him gehende endedæges wene.

Eala, hwæt se bið on worulde wis & gesælig þe ðis eal geðenceð oft & gelome & ðe Godes beboda geornlice gymeð & on Godes mildheortnesse fullice gehyhteð, & se ðe soðe lufe to Gode & to mannum gehealdeð mid rihte, & mid rihtre dædbote clænsað hine sylfne & ærran gewyrhta georne begeomerað.
Forðam God sylfa behet synfullum mannum þæt he wolde miltsian, gyf hi woldon earnian.
Ealswa se witega sang & sæde þa ða he ðus cwæð:Querite Dominum dum inueniri potest, et reliqua.
Item propheta dicit: In quacumque die peccator conuersus fuerit, et reliqua.
Et Dominus in euangelio dicit: Gaudium est angelis Dei super, et reliqua.
Eala, leofan men, utan nu efstan & ealle ure lifwegas geornlice rihtan, & ne latian na to lange ne ealles to swyðe, þe læs þe we forweorðan þonne we læst wenan.
Ac utan us sylfe mid godan geþance on worde & on weorce wenian to rihte & geearnian þa myrhðe mid Godes fylste þe ðam is gegearwod þe Gode wel gehyrað & his lage healdað þa hwyle þe hy libbað.
A sy ecum Gode lof & wyrðmynt in ealra woruld æfre butan ende, amen.
